paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: V122I TTR exhibits a destabilized quaternary structure and a stable tertiary structure relative to WT TTR.

variants.additional_notes: V122I is the most common familial TTR amyloid disease variant.
key_quotes: The V122I variant is linked to late onset familial amyloid cardiomyopathy, the most common familial TTR amyloid disease.

functional_data.summary: L55P TTR has a complicated denaturation pathway that includes dimers and trimers.

variants.additional_notes: L55P TTR is substantially less stable than WT TTR.
key_quotes: The L55P mutation is associated with the most aggressive familial TTR amyloid disease.

patients.phenotype: neuropathic forms of TTR amyloid disease

functional_data.summary: V30M TTR is destabilized relative to WT TTR.

variants.additional_notes: V30M TTR has stable quaternary structure but unstable tertiary structure.
key_quotes: V30M is the most common mutation associated with neuropathic forms of TTR amyloid disease.

functional_data.summary: A25T mutant is highly aggregation-prone and exhibits drastically reduced quaternary and tertiary structural stability.

variants.additional_notes: A25T TTR is associated with central nervous system amyloidosis.
key_quotes: The A25T mutant, associated with central nervous system amyloidosis, is highly aggregation-prone.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant variants in the TTR gene were extracted from the main text.
